Toasts.logoutFailed: There was a problem logging you you out. Please try again.
Toasts.logoutSucceeded: Un problème est survenu lors de votre déconnexion.

SupabaseErrorCodes.invalidCredentials: Login unsuccessful. Please verify your email and password and try again.
SupabaseErrorCodes.emailNotConfirmed: Account not activated. Please check your email for a confirmation link to activate your account before logging in.
SupabaseErrorCodes.invalidEmail: Invalid email address. Please use a valid email address.
SupabaseErrorCodes.userNotFound: Account not found. Please double-check your email and password and try again.
SupabaseErrorCodes.overLimit: Too many requests. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
SupabaseErrorCodes.genericError: There was an unexpected problem logging you in. Please try again later.
SupabaseErrorCodes.otpExpired: The One Time Passcode has expired or is invalid..
